name: Wincor Nixdorf Portugal
summary:
TPLinux project
Development of new features and maintenance of the POS as well as the back-office applications.
Proview project
PoC (Prof of Concept) and Roll-Out of the monitoring of ATM's agent.
Manage incidents / problems in the customer's ATM network with WN. Establishing correlations and filters for early identification of anomalies in HW. Design and integration with external tools (SIBS / EMIS).
